item.title: Sinseer Hip Hop and Spoken Word Hour. Broadcast on 30-Jul-2014
item.description: We listened to powerful work from Sage Francis, the Hilltop Hoods, and Newfoundland's own Hear/Say.

item.title: Sinseer Hip Hop and Spoken Word Hour. Broadcast on 16-Jul-2014
item.description: We listened to a selection from Cee's new album "This Is All I Know", Common Market's self titled break out album "Common Market", and several songs from The Herd's album "Summerland". I hope to see you all next week.
item.itunes:subtitle: Cee, The Herd, and Common Market

item.title: Sinseer Hip Hop and Spoken Word Hour. Broadcast on 09-Jul-2014
item.description:
Premier show of the Sinseer Hip Hop and Spoken Word Hour. this week was a sample of the kind of stuff you'll be hearing from me over the next two months. Special shout out to Missy D and the Laydy Jams for hooking me up with one of their new tracks, and to MC KT for coming on to spit something live for you. See you next week, Peace.
Tracklist: 1) Bliss n Eso - I am Somebody ft. Nas 2) Laydy Jams - Home 3) Hilltop Hoods - The Hard Road Restrung 4) Violent Ground - Rez Life 5) Dessa - The Bullpen 6) Cee - This is All I Know ft. Jonathan Emile 7) Horrorshow - In My Haze ft. Jane Tyrrell 8) Rhyme Asylum - Returmination 9) Tuka - Die a Happy Man 10) Wilz n States - Fallout
item.itunes:subtitle: First show on CiTR, Dylan Killin like a Villin for those Willin to be Chillin
